ComicInfo.Title: Twitch Chapter Four
ComicInfo.Series: John Carpenter's Tales of Science Fiction: Twitch
ComicInfo.Summary: One minute, you're knocking back a beer late at night, just trying to unwind after a tough day at work. The next minute, you're blind and handcuffed speeding through the desert while random people are shooting at you. But maybe you deserve it, because you tried to kill your wife and colleague just a few hours ago... That's right, baby; you're part of the hive now, and you just found out how everything you know and love can disappear with a single TWITCH...
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-22 18:36:00. [CVDB704852] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 10:23:41. [Issue ID 1943422]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Richard P. Clark,Richard Clark,Richard P. Clark
ComicInfo.Inker: Richard P. Clark,Richard Clark,Richard P. Clark
